title: How to fight the Evil One himself - Quora

response.answer_text: There isn't an Evil One on this planet, so you've got a few non-optimal options.a) Die.  Fight the Evil One in the afterlife.b) Space travel.  May take some time to find the right star even after you've invented interstellar travel.c) Parallel dimensions.  Again, may take some time even after you've invented the technology.  There's a _lot_ of them.d) Become the Evil One.  Then leave your archenemy alone in a room full of certain death.
The best way to fight the "evil one" is to not believe in it. The theory is that supernatural beings get their power from belief. Stop believing and they have no power over you.
